item.title: The Quantum Hype
item.description: If you’re anything like me, you’ve probably heard the term quantum computing thrown around more lately. But, what’s with all the hype around quantum computing? Quantum computing harnesses quantum mechanicsal phenomena to perform computation, so before we go into the nitty gritty details of all quantum computing has to offer, there’s a few fundamental quantum mechanical concepts we need to understand. Let’s rewind a few decades and see how all this started:
